duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and assure that assigned Application Support Staff promote customer service excellence.
Manage IT application development and system management of 95+ applications including Docubase, Bartender, Unix, Oracle, and others tied to production environments.
Provide month-end support to finance and other business units for reports.
Keep IT Management and end users abreast of issues impacting performance and system capacity with recommendations for corrective action or planning.
Coordinate training and documentation for the Application Support Staff regarding new and existing technologies within the organization.
Track application service requests, coordinate assignments, and audit the work completed to ensure issues are resolved to the customers’ satisfaction.
Responsible for application lifecycle management and ensuring the Application Portfolio is kept up to date.
Mentor, assist, and share learned knowledge and skills with fellow IT members.
Follow and adhere to the Project Management methodology as defined by the Project Management Office.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related required. (Master's preferred)
7-10 years of demonstrated application development and support experience with knowledge manufacturing and business processes.
Minimum of 5 years supervisory experience including hiring, performance management, salary administration.
Knowledge of various Operating System platforms is a plus.
Knowledge of desktop technology is preferred.
Experience with Microsoft technologies across the board (e.g. Windows 7, 10, 11, O365, OneDrive, SharePoint, Intune, Azure)
Understanding of networking protocols and principles
